name: Blackhole: Testing Laboratory
description: Our hero just signed up for the Endera's suicide mission, but he wants to be captain of the mission. What really happens and why he ended up as the coffee-guy? Try to uncover this secret!

name: Blackhole: Challenge Vault
description: Take everything you have experienced to the next level! Enter the Challenge Vault, a special simulation for Endera agents, and participate with others in a secret training protocol. Select your favourite character and beat the records set by other players in this brand new online mode.

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal: Advanced Fog of War in the Pacific
description: Advanced Fog of War in the PacificThis paid module offers more suspense as enemy losses, and the score remains uncertain until the end.

name: Rope Cow: Rope it to The Cow
description: Rope swing like never before.

name: Timeline Traveler II: Dream
description: Timeline Traveler II is a puzzle game that combined time control and platformer element together to provide a new game experience!

name: Rocketbirds 2: Rescue Bundle
description: Get the bundle and upgrade your Rescue Mode missions! Get all Hardboiled Chicken's Story Mode costumes, bullet blocking shields, chainsaws and boxing gloves. You can also rent the Master Duck himself! New items and the Master Duck are only available in this bundle!

name: Flute Master: Epic Christmas
description: Flute Master "Epic Christmas" DLC pack features 3 new rock editings of classical tracks Away in a Manger, Jingle Bells and Silent Night. Prepare to rock on with your recorder.

name: Flute Master: Trick or Treat
description: Flute Master "Trick or Treat" DLC pack features 3 new original songs Catch the Ghost, Spooky Mike and Vlady Party. Prepare that fright with your recorder.

name: Ancient Frontier: Quests & Events
description: Ancient Frontier - Quests & Events DLC adds two new features to the game. Quests are contracts that can be completed as you play through the game. Random Events will occur throughout a campaign, and the result will depend on the choices you make.

name: Ancient Frontier: The Crew
description: Ancient Frontier - The Crew DLC adds brave men and women from all walks of Frontier life that are ready to serve you, Commander. Crew members gain experience and offer a variety of bonuses to the ships they pilot.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad
description: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad Trial
description: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: XXZ: XXL - Rush
description: A nurse and a security officer working at the hospital are trying to escape from the city invaded by Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls Trial
description: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: Gunslingers of the Wasteland vs. The Zombies from Mars
description: Do battle across the American Southwest in this This Third-Person Shooter as you contend with the evil Dr. Arcturis and his legion of undead.

name: End of the World: VR
description: Your purpose is to make her fall into your sex desires. You need input direction to move to get some objects and props, avoid the bite of the zombie, play the mini game to get the point. Use your stick to open her legs at last!

name: March of War: StormSiege
description: StormSiege is a free Single-Player expansion for the Massively-Multiplayer Online Turn-Based Strategy game March of War. It contains three missions, released sequentially. Currently, only the first mission, Beachhead, is available. The remaining two will be released in the coming weeks.

name: Futuclass: Oxygen Escape Room
description: Escape the room using your chemistry knowledge! Explore the clues lying around. Clear up the poisonous gas blocking your exit. Turn a toxic combustion reaction into a regular combustion reaction. Heat up different liquids to obtain the needed molecules.

name: Futuclass: Hydrogen & Oxygen
description: Learn about Oxygen and Hydrogen in two lab experiments. See gas molecules with your naked eye and use the properties of gases to light a candle. Combine most active metals with an acid to produce enough hydrogen to launch a rocket. Answer in-game questions to capture the learning.

name: The Black Watchmen: Season 2 - Enduring Conflict
description: In Season 2 of The Black Watchmen you have been assigned to investigate the aftermath of the Abyss Incident. Get ready for a new set of missions, mini-games and puzzles where you'll battle against rival groups that wish to keep this advanced paranormal research to themselves.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Trophy Hunter's Equipment Pack
description: This 30+ item, licensed equipment pack contains all the additional equipment you need to land the biggest trophy fish available in Fishing Sim World.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Nelson
description: Lake Nelson is a picturesque fishing venue located in the heart of Texas. Fish for 15 different species including bass to 15lbs, as well as enter three different tournaments and three new career events with 25 new Boss Fish to hunt down and catch.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Arnold
description: The habitation around Lake Arnold in Tennessee provides a range of fishing opportunities for the ten different species found here.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Laguna Iquitos
description: Laguna Iquitos, in the heart of the rainforests of Peru adds two new species of fish - the beautiful peacock bass and terrifying giant wolf fish as well as a new style of boat, a kayak. Also catch huge arapaima, black pacu and red tail catfish.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Tackle Box Equipment Pack
description: This 50 item pack contains equipment that is perfect for all the styles of fishing available in game and will help you combat any situation you may face! With a brand new boat, rods, reels, lures and clothing there really is everything to set up your perfect in-game tackle box.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lago Del Mundo
description: Based in Andalucia, Spain, Lago del mundo (Lake of the World) is the first venue to offer fishing from static pegs around the lake as well as from a brand-new rigid inflatable boat. With catfish to 200lbs, huge largemouth (black bass), carp, pike, zander and roach, there is something for everyone!

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Bass Pro Shops Equipment Pack
description: This MEGA equipment pack contains all 316 items from the Bass Pro Shops edition of Fishing Sim World. It contains the best products that Bass Pro Shops produce, as well as boats from Tracker and Nitro and engines from Mercury.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Talon Fishery
description: Talon Fishery is the epitome of a pleasure fishing complex and gives you four separate lakes in one venue. Each contain their own stock of fish and species and are perfect for honing your match and float fishing skills.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Dylan
description: Located in Minnesota, Lake Dylan is over 2000 acres with 11 different species of fish to target. As well as containing trophy sized bass, this lake also contains giant Muskie, Tiger Muskie and Longnose Gar with the Muskie growing to a huge 53lbs.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lough Kerr
description: Lough Kerr is a perfectly formed, historic venue found in Ireland where anglers flock to try and catch a national bream record with the biggest being an incredible 21lbs. The lough also contains good sized carp, tench, roach and rudd.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Williams
description: Located in California, Lake Williams is surrounded by a stunning backdrop of dry arid land and forest-covered steep hills.

name: Night of Full Moon: Contract of Soul
description: Little Red Riding Hood becomes silent these days. She speaks less in public, but likes talking to herself. "Ninety-ninth soul..." Little Red murmuring. With but one more soul, she will complete the contract with the Reaper. However, to find the one last soul is more difficult than she could have imagined...

name: Night of Full Moon: Magic Curtain
description: As a descendant of the Hope family Little Red Riding Hood discovered a strange bond between her body and cards when she was very young. She sought to cover up this supernatural phenomenon and magic became her best excuse.

name: Night of Full Moon: Choice of Carpenter
description: Little Carpenter was fond of the Little Red Riding Hood who lived near the gate of village. He always played with her after work done. Seeing Little Red Riding Hood was so happy, Carpenter almost spoke out his love but he didn’t. Because there was always a secret only known by himself.

name: Night of Full Moon: Apothecary's Blessing
description: “My potion, heals good, kills evil” Little Red Riding Hood has been filled with curiosity for the natural world ever since childhood, and enjoys performing strange experiments. To care for her aging Grandma, she secretly learned how to concoct cheap potions from the crazy apothecary.

name: Night of Full Moon: Gear of Fate
description: The machine gave me a second life.When she was born,She was judged by a doctor that she would not survive a year due to cardiacdysplasia.At the insistence of her mother,the mechanical magician replaced her with a mechanical heart.After growing up,She seems to have a special connection with machinery

name: Night of Full Moon: The Red Hood Diary
description: Laid in the corner, cobwebbed and dusty, Who picked up the diary, broke the seal of memory? Thank you, Mister Carpenter, Let’s begin, the castle adventure.

name: Aurora
description: This visually rich cinematic animated VR short follows the lives of a young family and all who inhabit it’s vividly coloured landscape. “AURORA” draws the viewer into the emotive storyline by allowing them to get up close and personal with the characters.

name: The Message
description: First person shooter in setting of 80th years. You need to kill everyone in the house. Use guns on levels, be fast and kill without doubt.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - The Millionth Mile
description: The Millionth Mile is the first free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon. Focusing on the Eastern Bloc coalition, it will feature more than 60 new units for Poland, Czechoslovakia & East-Germany, bringing them in the 90's and on an equal footing with Wargame: Red Dragon's main nations.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Nation Pack: Netherlands
description: Wargame is back again with a brand new DLC for the million-selling franchise's third instalment, Wargame Red Dragon. In this new expansion for the spectacular real-time strategy game from Eugen Systems, the unique and diverse Dutch units are finally playable! Choose between 80 units and enter into a coalition with West Germany.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Second Korean War
description: Second Korean War is Wargame: Red Dragon’s second free DLC. It features a new solo campaign, set in an uchronical 1992 where the previous year's coup against Mikhaïl Gorbatchev has succeeded. The Party's old guard has restored Soviet order, getting closer to its Asian communist neighbors in the process, but is set on a confrontation..

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Norse Dragons
description: Norse Dragons is the third free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon. Dedicated to the Scandinavian coalition, it features more than 60 new units for Sweden, Denmark & Norway. Effectively propelling this coalition as well as the individual countries into the early 90's era, it will bring them onto an equal footing with the other nations.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - Ogredeath
description: Your quests through the legendary saga of the Northland continue in "Ogredeath" the latest DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny. Search for a missing member of Aventuria's elite messenger team. Join a band of huntsmen as you brave the legendary beasts of Torkil's Chasm and navigate the exacting currents of the Great Bodir River.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - For the Gods
description:
Delve deeper into the mystical lore of the Northland with 3 new heroic questlines in "For the Gods" the first DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny.
You've been entrusted by a nobleman from Clanegh with the difficult task of transforming the paramour of a Thorwalian leader's daughter into a worthy suitor.

name: Infini: #InfiniPrison
description: Ignite your jetpack and propel yourself through a challenging time-attack level. Share your score with the community using #InfiniPrison!

name: Elemental Heroes: Blue Fighter 20th Level Set
description: Blue Fighter Set of 20th level with random parameters for Elemental Heroes

name: For Honor: Gryphon Hero
description: A well-known veteran has returned! Wield the mighty Bardiche as Gryphon, a new playable hero.

name: For Honor: Warmonger Hero
description: Prey on the weak as a Warmonger, new playable Hero. Strike and impale with the Flamberge, a legendary two-handed sword!

name: FutureKreate
description: This Robot Simulator is a cutting-edge robot simulator developed by a robotics researcher. You can experience the state-of-arts robotics development with this simulator. Experiment with your robot in the town, mountains, oceans, and the skies at various times!

name: Beyond the Thaw
description: You are a Max Gilbert, a former military doctor. While taking a trip to your usual place of stay, the next moment you find yourself alone in the middle of nowhere, fighting fierce cold and facing series of trials. What is it: reality or mind games, behind which lies your deep secret?

name: Cronicas de Landulph
description: 10 anos se passaram depois que o Deus Maligno Cruel foi derrotado, o mundo deveia agora viver em paz. O Grande Órion foi responsabilizado pelos crimes de Cruel e sumiu junto com os Shadowrunners. Sem os salvadores do mundo, cabe a você salvar o mundo.

name: Railroad X: Car-set Porsche and Mercedes
description: This set consists of an assortment of Porsche 911 and Mercedes Benz 220D models.The original Porsche 911 (pronounced nine eleven, German: Neunelfer) was a luxury sports car made by Porsche AG of Stuttgart, Germany. The famous, distinctive, and durable design was introduced in autumn 1963 and built through 1989.

name: Space Battle Arena
description: Space fight arena is a retro arcade based arena shooter game that was modeled after legendary arcade games. This game retains the fun, addicting aspects of those arcade games while also adding on new, awesome features such as challenges, skins, and a world wide leaderboard.

name: Be Quiet!: Act One
description: Go through the story of Be Quiet! and begin with Act 1 where you start in a forest at a house

name: Goddess of Card War: DLC-1
description: A new card character can be purchased in the mall: Yulou

name: Goddess of Card War: DLC-2
description: A new card character can be purchased in the mall: Manli

name: Blades of Time: Dismal Swamp
description: Michelle rushes into the Temple of Dragons to prevent Ayumi from joining Keeper of Chaos when her shuttle suddenly crashes in the middle of Dismal Swamp.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Shattered Timelines
description: Shattered Timelines introduces new mechanisms and exciting new challenges. Can you repair time before it runs out?! Includes Chrono-Ranger, Omnitron-X, La Capitan, The Dreamer, Kismet, Iron Legacy, The Block, & Time Cataclysm.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Rook City
description: Dark streets, vile sewers, and twisting alleys; all home to the terrible criminals that control this city. Welcome to Rook City, where evil never sleeps. Includes Expatriette, Mr. Fixer, The Chairman, The Matriarch, Plague Rat, Spite, Pike Industrial Complex, and Rook City.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Wrath of the Cosmos
description: The Cosmos are leaving their mark on the Multiverse! Do you have what it takes to save the earth from the impending annihilation? Includes Captain Cosmic, Sky-Scraper, Deadline, Infinitor, Kaargra Warfang, Progeny, Dok’Thorath Capital, and The Enclave of the Endlings.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: OblivAeon
description: The final mega-expansion includes 5 heroes, 5 environments, and the ultimate boss fight against OblivAeon itself!

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Mini-Pack 5 - Void Guard
description: Four heroes return to fight against the end of all things and hold back the Void when no one else can!

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Villains of the Multiverse
description: Villains of the Multiverse is a mega-expansion that adds to the Villain Team Mode introduced in the Vengeance expansion. This expansion includes ten villains, which can be faced in any configuration and combined with Vengeance villains, as well as four exciting new environments.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Infernal Relics
description: Ancient deities, extra-planar elder gods, and dark spirits threaten the very fabric of reality! Includes The Argent Adept, NightMist, Akash'Bhuta, Apostate, The Ennead, GloomWeaver, Realm of Discord, and Tomb of Anubis.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Mini-Pack 1
description: Travel back in time to the Old West, outwit a crafty hero-hunter, and use technopathic abilities to create mechanical golems from spare parts! Includes Unity, Ambuscade, and Silver Gulch, 1883.

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Fa223 Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[Fa223] Berta Hildebrand"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; German [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Ju87G Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Do335 Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[Do335] Berta Hildebrand"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; German[W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - AVRO Spade Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[AVRO Spade] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; Great Britain [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - XB-35 Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[XB-35] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; U.S.A [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - BV P188 Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[BV P188] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; U.S.A [W]

name: Command Ops 2: Westwall Vol. 7
description: The Westwall series covers the Allied attempts to breach the vaunted Siegfried Line and drive into the heart of Germany in the fall of 1944. The scenarios range in size from Regimental actions through to Army level operations. Contains 12 scenarios.

name: Command Ops 2: Ride of the Valkyries Vol. 3
description: Ride of the Valkyries contains 12 scenarios covering Hitler’s last offensive in what became known as the 1944 Battle of the Bulge.

name: Command Ops 2: The Cauldron Vol. 5
description: The Cauldron Contains 20 Scenarios covering the famous battles in the Mediterranean and North Africa during 1941 through 1942

name: Command Ops 2: Bastogne Vol. 4
description: Bastogne contains 12 scenarios covering the southern shoulder of the 1944 Battle of the Bulge.

name: Command Ops 2: Bradley at Bay Vol. 8
description: Many of these battles involved low unit density over large map areas. This will be markedly different from the more highly congested Battles from the Bulge and Market Garden. They will also provide a good mix of different force types and qualities.

name: Command Ops 2: Foothills of the Gods Vol. 2
description: Foothills of the Gods contains 19 scenarios, covering the German offensive to conquer Greece in 1941.

name: Command Ops 2: Knock on all Doors vol. 6
description: Knock on all Doors is a 12 scenarios covering the momentous decisions in the first 48 hours of the battle of the bulge in Belgium 1944.

name: Command Ops 2: Highway to the Reich Vol. 1
description: Highway to the Reich contains 13 scenarios covering the famous 1944 Operation Market Garden. Fought in Holland, it saw the Allied First Airborne Corps attempt to capture the cities of Eindhoven, Nijmegen and the ultimate prize Arnhem.

name: Toxic Terror: Episode 2 - The Lich's Lair
description: A malicious lich has risen and is building an army of ghouls to take over the world. It must be stopped before it's too late for humanity!

name: Tiny Town VR: Zombie Pack
description: Zombie themed expansion pack for Tiny Town VR. Includes new characters, buildings, vehicles, and props.

name: Anarchy Legends: Online
description: Anarchy Legends Online is a multiplayer tactical action third-person shooter inspired by old competitive multiplayer games focusing on team-based tactics and real individual skills.

name: Max Gentlemen: Animal Pack
description: 3 new characters, 6 new hats and the cannon level. Guest Starring Octodad!

name: The Trial
description: "Someone must have been telling lies about Josef K., he knew he had done nothing wrong but, one morning, he was arrested." Story about life, choices and a Man vs the System. This unique literature, even after 100 years is still up to date. Brought to You in early text-adventure games style.

name: XenoShyft: Dreadmire
description: Welcome to the Dreadmire! XenoShyft: Dreadmire, which can be played as a standalone game or mixed with assets from XenoShyft: Onslaught, brings a new XenoShyft experience to your screen, with eight new troop types, 20 new item types, and more than 40 fearsome new enemy types.

name: XenoShyft: NorTec Elite
description: With this XenoShyft expansion, troops that survive a round in your lane will have the chance to be upgraded to heroes! And you'll randomly find experimental versions of items in your item stacks!

name: XenoShyft: Forbidden Sciences
description: The Forbidden Sciences expansion includes all-new Division Cards for the Psychogenics Lab and Grafting Research divisions, as well as five all-new items for both Divisions, adding a wealth of new variety to your games!

name: Kalimba: The Dark Void - Solo
description: Enter the Dark Void and find out who the Dark Shaman really is… maybe. 10 levels of exciting solo puzzle-platforming that will have your head spinning - download now and enter the Dark Void!

name: One Shell Straight to Hell: X Layers of Fear
description: One Shell Straight to Hell X Layers of Fear is the crossover DLC nobody expected (nor asked for) that will give you a new unique and original perspective on the ending of the psychological horror game from Bloober Team. Expect lots of black humour, cursed paintings, and guns.

name: Time for You: Chapter 02 - Dirty Thoughts and Corporate Bots
description: The continuation of Time For You! There's something strange going on at ETMI Corp. Selena has been gone for too long and her coworkers are anything but normal. Find Selena, figure out what's going on, and get home. Should be easy, right?

name: Combat Mission Shock Force 2: NATO Forces
description: NATO Forces is the third module in the Combat Mission: Shock Force family of contemporary land warfare simulations. Now you have a chance to play with the forces of three additional NATO countries; Germany, Canada, and the Netherlands.

name: The Entity: Returning Home
description: In this DLC you will find out the truth behind the creature after the events of The Entity and what it actually wants with Jack and his family.

name: Day of Dragons: Acid Spitter Drake
description: The Acid Spitter Drake is a fast, agile, and hardy pack hunter with an acidic bite that applies decay to its victims.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Earth Class
description: Earth is a medium to close range damage dealer with great survivability and a mix of class based utility spells. His passive spell gives him damage reduction in relation to his current mana which adds a level of toughness not seen in other classes.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Lightning Class
description: Lightning is a long-range specialist that uses air, electricity, and storms to strike down his enemies from afar. By altering allied wizards electrical lifeforce he can also use electricity to revitalize and energize allies giving health and movement bonuses.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Fire Class
description: Fire is designed to be the easiest class to play well but it can also be one of the hardest to master. At its core, the class is an area-of-effect damage dealer. This makes it great for controlling large areas and supporting a battle with consistent high damage.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Nature Class
description: With power over life and death a Nature wizard is vital for a successful team composition. She is Grimoire’s primary healing class but like all classes in Grimoire she can also do solid damage.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing - Jezioro Bestii
description: A remastered, favourite is back but with new species and bigger fish! With 17 different species of fish and 25 Boss Fish, this venue fits every style of fishing with predators weighing over 100lb and carp to 50lb.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing - Lake Beasts Equipment Pack
description: A 53-item pack containing a wide variety of items from boats to baits that will help you find, hook and land the elusive monster boss fish found in The Catch: Carp & Coarse.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - Prequel Trilogy Character Pack
description: Return to where it all began with some of your favorite characters from Episodes I, II and III with the The Prequel Trilogy Character Pack. This character pack includes Darth Maul, Padmé, Jango Fett, Jar Jar Binks, and Anakin Skywalker.

name: Placefront
description: PLACEFRONT is a stylized and relaxing city builder with unique architecture, drivable vehicles, diverse biomes, and over 150 ready-to-place objects. Also includes 4 stock levels and Ramp Dream level.

name: Guardians of Graxia: Elves & Dwarves
description: In this first major expansion for Guardians of Graxia, Elves & Dwarves, the world of Graxia is greeted by two new Guardians from faraway islands, Flist the deceitful Elf and Broxin the greedy Dwarf. Included in the expansion are ever more powerful units and abilities that you will be able to use in battle, as well as six additional...

name: Hunger Dungeon: New Challenger Pack
description: The new challenger coming...

name: Pathmaker
description: Pathmaker is a single-player puzzle game with the goal to get all of your carts from one side to the other. Cross tracks, avoid obstacles, and make sure the carts don't collide with each other. 130 levels range from simple to very challenging. Exercise your logic skills!

name: Catlateral Damage: VR
description: Catlateral Damage is a first-person destructive house cat simulator where you play as a cat and knock as much stuff onto the ground as possible. Now with VR support for the HTC Vive!

name: Fantasyland: All Heroes
description: All the heroes in the fantasyland.

name: MagiCats Builder: Infinite Pack
description: Your power can’t wait. Buy the infinite pack and let your imagination be THE only limit.

name: Fortune's Tavern: The Fantasy Tavern Simulator - Miniature Gods
description: Miniature Gods is the fourth DLC available for 'Fortune's Tavern: The Fantasy Tavern Simulator!' In 'Miniature Gods' you get the chance to make new, unique allies in the form of spirits, demi-gods, and demons who will fight beside you as you quest in the Enchanted Forest or help you carry out raids on rival taverns.

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Battle Cars
description: Introducing ‘BATTLE CARS’ the brand-new combat racing pack from MANTIS BURN RACING! Unleash explosive levels of fun with an all-new class of highly armed, battle-ready vehicles in intense online combat or frenetic split-screen battles for up to 4 players.

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Snowbound Pack
description: Expand your Mantis Burn Racing experience with all-new free content in the ‘Snowbound Pack’. Put the freeze on your opponents as you jump, bump and slide your way across four stunning new snow-themed tracks that will push your driving skills to the limits!

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Elite Class
description: Take your Mantis Burn Racing gameplay to the next level with a brand-new Class of ‘Elite’ vehicles that come complete with their own stand-alone career campaign.

name: RoShamBo Arena: Starter Fighter Pack
description: The Starter Fighter Pack will give you everything you need to become the best in RoShamBo arena!

name: Voltage: Episode 2
description: In Episode 2, you try to bring freedom to Voltage and fight against evil forces as you traverse the Voltage Town, Red Forest and many other areas. Your mission is to find resistance scientists, together you might be able to bring peace to the Voltage.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Gauntlet
description: The war for control continues in Gauntlet! Featuring a new single-player scenario and some new maps for multiplayer, Gauntlet will have you beating your foes into submission in one exciting battle after the next.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Secret Missions
description: Exciting new scenarios, new units, and huge maps await you in Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation’s largest DLC yet! Take on the role of a PHC leader and conquer dangerous missions where the odds are stacked against you, or join with the Substrate to repel your PHC oppressors.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Oblivion
description: The Post Human Coalition and the Substrate continue to fight for control of worlds across the galaxy as the PHC looks to expand their reach. Crush your enemies and conquer a variety of new maps, or face down an unexpected and powerful enemy in the new Oblivion scenario.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Turtle Wars
description: This new DLC pack for Stardock’s massive RTS features new unique gameplay scenarios and new maps to keep your skirmishes fresh.

name: Look and Find: Curiosity
description: A game of searching scenes, finding objects, earning coins and unlocking new levels. The objects you find will be added to your collection and can be viewed at any time.

name: Ironcast: The Stirling Pack
description: The Stirling Pack includes an additional Ironcast, ‘The Stirling’; as well as a new Commander, Katherine Chapman.

name: Soul at Stake: Lament of the Lovers
description: “情蛊靡音”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“惘灵”，一名新赌徒“荣氏”，以及一张新地图“遗情古寨”。额外赠送1个惘灵嘲讽动作、5张惘灵专属底牌、5张荣氏专属底牌、5张荣氏组队底牌【置身事外】。

name: Soul at Stake: Blood Ritual
description: “圣血之殇”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“血仆”，一名新赌徒“淑芬”，以及一张新地图“血色医院”。额外赠送1个血仆嘲讽动作、5张血仆专属底牌、5张淑芬专属底牌、5张淑芬组队底牌【置身事外】，以及200000筹码。

name: Soul at Stake: Frozen Village
description: The Frozen Village is a new addition to the world of Soul at Stakes, it will include a new Devil, "The Witch", and a new map, "The Frozen Village". This DLC will be free for a limited time, one month from release date until October 14, 2018 , after this timeframe it will be changed to a paid DLC.

name: Soul at Stake: Terror Cruise
description: “赌船惊魂”是《灵魂筹码》的新增内容，包含一名新恶灵“卡屠”，一名新赌徒“明美”，以及一张新地图“幸运星号”。

name: Soul at Stake: Funeral of the Flowers
description: "Funeral of the Flowers" is the new DLC of Soul at Stake, including a new Devil "the Geisha", a new Gambler "Aoki", and a new map "Sakura Shrine". EXTRA BONUS: The Geisha gesture x1, the Geisha's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's Trump 【Bystander】 x5.

name: Smugglers 5: Invasion - Warrior Within
description: With this downloadable content (DLC) you will receive three background stories (mini-quests) for the game "Smugglers 5: Invasion" - "Warrior Within", "Golden Claw" and an "Aftermath" preview, "First Contact".

name: Night of the Meteor
description:
'Night of the Meteor' is a non commercial Fan-Adventure in development.

"Ah! An unwelcome visitor!
How silly of me, I should have tied you to my bed!"
That's how Edna Edison (a nurse who's as nasty as she is ugly) used to greet the male visitors, which were unmindfull enough to enter the old Victorian mansion, built on the outskirts of town, where a meteor has crashed over 20 years ago.

Nothing has changed since then. Her husband, Dr.Fred still wasn't at dinner for the past five years and their son, Weird Ed a paramilitary nut is still waiting for his commando package.

So, every time when you play this game, it'll be The Night of the Meteor!

name: Smashteroid
description: A small fast paced platformer game

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Rainbow mercenary
description: Do you like to dream, have your head in the clouds, build sweet castles in the air, and ride the rainbow? He definitely doesn't like it. At all! He isn't an ordinary unicorn. He didn't get rose-colored glasses at birth.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Caesar
description: This time-management genius can teach you how to plan out your day. Only with him, last on the agenda is always victory over your enemies. For added confidence in your success, the indestructible Caesar pack includes 100 gold, 50,000 chips and his legendary dice. Ave, Caesar!

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - King
description: Everyone has a dream. Someone wants a castle made of cotton candy, someone wants to rule the world, and someone wants to build a super-mega monopoly! But often dreams are just dreams... That's when Martin Luther King comes to your rescue! Should you follow him and he will lead to the fulfillment of all your plans for sure.

name: Business Tour: Football - Forward Number 7
description: Victory is always around you! Guru of motivation will explain to you why fortitude and self-improvement are important. He will teach you how to turn on your handsome-man mode, and how to go only forward to victory! And of course your self-confidence will grow. Dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will only contribute to this.

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Mr. and Mrs. Balloonski
description: There are many different superpowers. Someone can move objects with his mind, someone can burns everything in his path with a look, and someone is even immortal! And there are superheroes who created explicitly for something special but even they don't know for what... But they don't care what other people say.

name: Business Tour: Football - Forward Number 10
description: It is so hard for one to pretend to be a normal man, and those wings under one's shirt are not making it any better. But he has to be patient if he wants to play. And he loves to play so much! He may lend you his nimbus, if you want it.

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Wild bird
description: Behold the superman, superpigeon, superpostman! And yeah, he can never have enough "super". He is a real superguy! Long time ago when he was a little kid he found his true calling. He delivers parcels at the speed of light anywhere in the world! But not exactly at the speed of light, because he isn't a very good pilot.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Cleopatra
description: Brush up your leopard grace, get the gold of all the desert sands and the greatness of the sun as a bonus. It's Cleopatra! The great queen of Egypt is ready to give you the vacant seat of her favorite cat. Together you will bring everyone to their knees within a radius of the Business Tour.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Napoleon
description: He majestically walks over conquered lands. He holds his head proudly. He directs his victorious gaze towards new territories. He sets the goal. He reaches one. His main gift to you is a sense of distinctiveness. You'll also get 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Lincoln
description: The level-80 sense of purpose helped him to reach incredible heights. He is ready to share it with you. Pinch off just a small piece and you will become a great president ... that is a monopolist. And Uncle Abe's inheritance of 100 gold, 50.000 chips and the legendary dice will help to establish yourself in your new status.

name: Tortuga
description: The goal is is to explore the island and collect all the fruits without dying. You have to be perfect and it' nearly impossible. You have to be precise and it's really difficult. You have to have a lot of patience and it's demanding. But definitely work hard.

name: The Sych Story: Ded's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Necronomistore: Black Friday - Season One
description: Delve into the world of Necronomistore, a shopping Goliath which is currently in the process of gearing up for a sure fire Black Friday disaster. But there's bigger stakes at play, its up to you to keep an eye on the resident depressed rantaholic janitor and help uncover a sinister conspiracy.

name: Pankapu: Episode 2
description: Pankapu: the Last Aegis delves deeper into Djaha’rell’s dreams to find Faith, the Last Aegis.

name: Danger Gazers: Next Stop
description: A new path stop has appeared! Mr. Honest invites all the risk takers to spin the Baraban. It might be your lucky day if you've got the crystals or... it could leave you empty handed as it usually happens.

name: Crowntakers: Undead Undertakings
description: Crowntakers – Undead Undertakings leads you into the land of the living dead. Explore the sinister depths of the Necropolis where death and decay have left their foul footprints. Battle the horrors risen from their graves like zombies, skeletons and vampires, lead your fellow mercenaries to victory and back to sunnier climes.

name: Dere Exe: Classic Edition
description: Experience the original DERE EXE in all its unstable glory, rage-inducing controls, and all. The events in this game are not canon in the AppSir Games Universe, only the 2021 Remake establishes the continuity and lore of the series. Install this free DLC and find the game in your local files.

name: Sumatra: Fate of Yandi - Collector's Edition
description: The Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Collector's Edition contains a downloadable art book, the full soundtrack and a short bonus game!

name: Emerland Solitaire 2: Collector's Edition
description: An exciting journey into the world of magical Solitaire awaits! A stunning new game with classic rules. Hundreds of fun levels, dangerous opponents and heroic companions await you in an adventure full of mysteries and secrets!

name: The Witch's Apprentice: A Magical Mishap - Collector's Edition
description: The Collector's Edition includes: - 10 additional Levels (Help Grimelda on another adventure and defeat the evil ice spirit to save the poor villagers!) - Wallpapers - ingame Strategy Guide

name: Tornuffalo: Full-Body Action with Vive Trackers
description: Dodge, jump and kick using your whole body! Attach Vive Trackers to your feet and back to play a full-body version of Tornuffalo! Dodge and deflect debris from the storm as you smash gems for points. Free to Tornuffalo owners.

name: Voltage: Super Retro
description: VOLTAGE SuperRetro Edition is graphically designed to look almost 100% Amiga/C-64 -game, it is using special shaders. Now you can play Voltage with a SuperRetro look!

name: Electronic Super Joy 2: Gold Edition
description: Do you want the Gold Edition Experience? Do you want to support the developers & musicians of this game? Then buy the GOLD EDITION! 3 new levels, Boss Fight, New Ability, Bonus Music, full game soundtrack of 43 songs, 3 Full-sized HD Digital Posters, and Behind The Scenes developer sketches + in-progress screenshots & GIFs.

name: Bloodsports.TV: Blood Brawl
description: BLOOD BRAWL is the first free DLC for Bloodsports.TV, including two new maps, four new items, a new boss as well as a brand new game mode: Blood Brawl!

name: Simutrans: Pak128.German
description: Brings the German transportation system embedded in typical German towns and industries according to the respective topographic region (coasts, the Alps, etc). Trains is taller than they are in standard pak128. Every building and factory has four views and each type of factory has different aspects.

name: Simutrans: Pak128.Britain
description: Developed to give a British theme to Simutrans, this pakset features a wide range of vehicles with emphasis on rail vehicles, highly detailed stations, more accurate looking track for junctions, and a more subdued graphical appearance than the brightly coloured pak128 from which it was originally derived.

name: Simutrans: Pak64
description: Pak64 is the evolution of the original Simutrans pakset. Many artists have contributed to this pakset since the 8 bit age.

name: Simutrans: Pak128.Japan
description: The Japanese community has always built many great objects for Simutrans. It was felt, that the scale of pak64 did not meet the desired level of detail. Thus pak128.Japan was designed. Trains are enhanced compared to the standard size and the graphic consistence makes this pak a work of art.

name: Spirit
description: Take control of the helpless beings on the island and guide them. Survive, grow and continue the course of life. Don't let the harsh reality of mother nature take you down.

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-2
description: Open a new fighter: De Havilland

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-4
description: Open a new fighter: Huppamalin

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-1
description: Open a new fighter: Curtis

name: OneShot: Aftermath
description: OneShot: Aftermath is the fan sequel to the surreal top down Puzzle/Adventure game “OneShot”. One year after the events of Solstice, you and Niko find yourselves thrown back inside the world, but something has changed.

name: Spacelords: Raiders of the Broken Planet - Wardog Fury Campaign
description: Harec wants Loaht to join his Raiders but the Wardogs are out for his blood. Wardog leader General Marmalade wants all the Aleph and Loaht is a loose end. Loaht’s fury could win the war but who will get to him first? WARDOG FURY is a premium campaign for Raiders of the Broken Planet.

name: Diner Bros: Taco Amigos Campaign
description: It's Tuesday, what's for dinner? Tacos should hit the spot and Taco Amigos has just opened. Let's try there! ¡Bienvenido a Taco Amigos!

name: Mind Maze: Campaign "Triplex"
description: We are happy to present you a new campaign "Triplex", which includes 25 new levels.

name: DCS World: Spitfire - Epsom Campaign
description: Fly the legendary Spitfire LF Mk. IX over Normandy in June 1944 as the allies attempt to break out of the D-Day landing beachheads. Battle German forces in the air and on the ground as the allies push south over 12 missions south of the Juno and Gold landing beaches.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation - Arctic Hawk
description: Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base. Rescue an as hostage held agent from an unknown arms dealer, adapt to changing weather conditions, and use the the darkness of the night to your favor in this unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: DCS World: Black Shark 2 - Republic Campaign
description: The Black Shark: Republic campaign is a hand-crafted campaign that tells the story of you as a Black Shark attack helicopter pilot. The campaign is non-linear and has story arcs that branch based on your mission results.

name: Spacelords: Raiders of the Broken Planet - Alien Myths Campaign
description: The Raiders explore the Broken Planet in search of the Protectors. With their help, Harec hopes to expel the human invaders. On their adventure, the Raiders will face cruel enemies, establish alliances and unravel the mystery of an antagonistic power that is conspiring against them from the shadows.

name: Sengoku Jidai: Gempei Kassen
description: Gempei Kassen brings you an era 300 years before the Sengoku Jidai, featuring one of the biggest conflicts in medieval Japan which ended with the Shoguns into power

name: Sengoku Jidai: Genko MP Skirmishes
description: 4 new army lists are added to the Skirmish mode of Sengoku Jidai, introducing a Yuan army list (Mongol Invasion) and 3 Japanese ones (Hojo and two generic clans called Aoi and Akai).

name: Sengoku Jidai: Bjeongja Horan Campaign - 2nd Manchu Invasion of Korea 1636
description: 1637, the Manchu have invaded Korea, and the Joseon stand alone against the Qing. Will you play as the Joseon and try to expel the invaders? Or will you side with the Qing and complete the conquest of the peninsula?

name: Project Amalthea: Campaign
description: Project Amalthea: Campaign allows you to explore huge location surrounding Amalthea 2 orbital station in 15+ hours single player campaign.

name: DCS World: Su-27 - The Ultimate Argument Campaign
description: “Su-27 - The Ultimate Argument” is the storyline campaign for a Russian Air Force pilot flying the Su-27 fighter aircraft in the Digital Combat Simulator. The campaign is based on a fictional Caucasus conflict scenario, into which border states of the region got involved.

name: DCS World: Mi-8MTV2 - Oilfield Campaign
description: Life in civil aviation is far removed from dangers of military conflict. Instead, it’s based on strict time tables and lunch breaks. Meet a group of old friends: captain Jury Maksimovich Protasov and his Mi-8MTV2 crew. After the events of the "Spring Tension" conflict, they are again in business together.

name: DCS World: F-15C - The Georgian War Campaign
description: "The Georgian War" is a fictional campaign created by Chris "Viper" Long and Baltic Dragon, and is inspired by real events that took place during the Russo-Georgian War of 2008. This campaign puts you in the role of a pilot who arrives in Tbilisi as part of a small detachment intended to present the capabilities of...

name: DCS World: F-5E - Aggressors Air Combat Maneuver Campaign
description: The F-5E Aggressors ACM campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-5E Tiger II, as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base. Based on real world procedures you will fly as Red Air against Blue Air Forces.

name: DCS World: F-5E - Aggressors Basic Fighter Maneuvers Campaign
description: The F-5E Aggressors Basic Fighter Maneuvers (BFM) campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-5E Tiger II, as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base.Based on real world procedures you will fly as Red Air against Blue Air Forces.

name: DCS World: F-15C - Aggressors BFM Campaign
description: The F-15C Aggressors BFM campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-15C Eagle as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base. Based on real world procedures, you will fly as "Red Air" against "Blue Air" forces.

name: DCS World: P-51D - High Stakes Campaign
description: The "P-51D: High Stakes" campaign is a single-player, story-driven campaign for DCS: P-51D Mustang. The premise of the campaign is that a powerful businessman and gambler named "Maslov" has employed the pilot-for-hire pilot Vasily Sinitsa with promises of mountains of money.

name: DCS World: F-15C - Red Flag Campaign
description: The F-15C 16-2 Red Flag Campaign is a depiction of flying the F-15C Eagle during a typical Red Flag exercise in the skies over Nevada. This campaign includes extensive briefing, map, and lineup card PDF files for each mission and was designed in consultation with the renowned author Steve Davies, the authority on the F-15C.

name: DCS World: UH-1H - Argo Campaign
description: "Argo" is a story-driven campaign comprising a series of Naval Operations with the iconic UH-1H. As a pilot of the Hellenic Navy, assigned to the recently obtained FFG-46 Argo Frigate, your day-by-day missions include a variety of demanding tasks such as flying in all-weather conditions, Search & Rescue ops, Cargo delivery,...

name: DCS World: Mi-8MTV2 - The Border Campaign
description: "The Border" is the storyline campaign of a Russian Air-Force pilot flying the Mi-8MTV2 helicopter inside DCS World. The player serves as a helicopter commander in the South Ossetia border area.

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Card Game
description: This original digital card game offers intense sessions for 2 to 6 players that last between 20 and 60 minutes, in single-player and multiplayer modes with peer to peer play as well as on the official servers in Europe and in Asia.

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Card Game, Print & Play Set
description: Gremlins, Inc. – CARD GAME is the original standalone card game set in the world of Gremlins, Inc. The game is designed for 2 to 6 players, with average playtime of 30-60 minutes per session, and has been enjoyed by hundreds of board game enthusiasts from all over the world since 2015.

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Famous Figures
description: This exceptional DLC presents the famous figures of the past, who to this day serve as the prime example of what it means to be a true gremlin! New portraits, new music theme, new main menu visuals – and new special items!

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Astral Gamblers
description: This DLC introduces the immortal masters who inhabit the Astral Plane. Featuring 12 new character portraits, a new music track, new main menu background, new player icons, new player profiles, it also presents a new player communication feature: global effects!

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Agents of Chaos
description: This DLC delivers an array of cosmetic items, plus a whole new single-player campaign with custom decks and custom playing field rules for each of its 12 challenges.

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Uninvited Guests
description: Meet the uninvited guests who come to visit our clockwork-town in the hopes of finding fame and fortune! 12 new character portraits, 6 additional animated emoticons, 8 additional messages, an alternative music for main menu, and more. NB: this DLC does not affect the gameplay mechanics of the game.

name: Chicken Invaders 4: Easter Edition
description: New problems are hatching this Easter! Can you fight off an army of invading Easter Bunnies?

name: Spellweaver: Duke's Zombies Deck
description: Duke's Zombies Deck (1 hero + 60 cards) - Swarm your opponent with endless hordes of zombies. Keep the pressure on by making them deadly with your Undead Necromancers, and if that isn't enough, you can always rely on Duke Harsford to raise them back and keep the party going.

name: Spellweaver: Vampire Overlord Deck
description: Vampire Overlord Deck (1 hero + 60 cards) - Use your solid defensive cards to establish a board presence early on with this deck. Once you have done so play Vampirism and use your hero skill to completely dominate the game.

name: Spellweaver Chronicles: The Holy Child
description: The Holy Child (includes 100+ cards of all rarities) - The long awaited story-driven Spellweaver campaign is finally available. Play through the missions and get all the cards to build yourself a very formidable deck!

name: Plasticalypse: Submarine Adventures
description: A journey of the last ocean cleaner submarine that is tasked to restore the ecosystem of a dying earth. "Plasticalypse: TrashSub Adventures“

name: WGT Golf: Long Drive Bundle
description:
Packed with power and value, this bundle is designed to take you farther off the tee - as you may have guessed! The best part is players at all levels will benefit from these premium upgrades.

The Long Drive Bundle includes:

- Titleist TS2 Driver (L0+): Your drive sets the tone for each hole, so make them count with this popular upgrade improving your overall distance and forgiveness
- 6x Titleist Pro V1x Ultra Slow Meter Vapor Balls (L0+): These top performing golf balls slow down the swing meter to help you hit more accurately and consistently, plus the added vapor trail makes each shot easier to track
- 2,000 WGT Credits: Visit the Pro Shop to find more equipment upgrades to pair with the above, and fresh new apparel items for your golfer
- 100,000 Coins: Test your skills in multiplayer games or rent special clubs in the Pro Shop
- 5x Platinum Apparel Packs: Give your golfer its own style with unique apparel items, including hats, shirts, gloves, pants and shoes, that will improve both their performance and appearance
- Immediately unlock all courses

name: Master of Orion: Retro Fleets
description: Go retro and experience the classic era of gaming once more. Convert your ships into pixel-themed variants to restore the 8-bit charm of the past. Conquer the stars, bit by bit!

name: Master of Orion: Trilarian Shoal
description: An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars! The eldritch Trilarian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

name: My Train Arrives: Big cities
description: In this update you get access to two big maps.

name: My Train Arrives: City pack
description: In the DLC you will get access to three new cities.

name: My Train Arrives: Neighbouring cities
description: With this DLC you will be able to play on a big map with three cities on it.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - The Caleuche
description: She's returned and she's after you. Dive into a mystic and tragic adventure, prove yourself against the most dreadful and dangerous enemy. Survive and claim the greatest prize any captain would dream of.

name: Click Space Miner 2: Deluxe Edition
description: In Click Space Miner II you take control over a mining company in space. There is a big market, a lot of customers, but therefore also a lot of concurrents so you have to mine fast. Click fast to get rich. Mine resources with your mouse fast and buy new tools and machines to do the work for you. Earn more and more money and get rich.

name: Squares Rage: Character - Crying Chris
description: Play as him through your Squares Rage levels to try and get him to stop crying.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Desert Wings - Tobruk
description: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Desert Wings - Tobruk is an immersive, realistic and challenging combat flight-simulation set over the sands of the North Africa campaign in WWII. Experience what it was like to fly and fight in Messerschmitts, Macchis, Kittyhawks and Spitfires during the Desert War.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-1b Collector Plane
description: The Yak-1b, also know as the Yak-1 Series 127, is the pinnacle of the Yak-1 fighter design that includes all of the incremental improvements introduced in 1942.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-9 Series 1 Collector Plane
description: Yak-9 proved itself as very maneuverable and easy to control fighter, earning the love and respect of many Soviet pilots along with volunteer French from the Normandie Niemen fighter regiment.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Hurricane Mk.II Collector Plane
description: The legendary British-built Hurricane came to fame during the Battle of Britain where it did the heavy lifting for the RAF in that pivotal battle. Unlike popular belief, it was the sturdy and more numerous Hurricane and not the sexier Spitfire that really made the difference.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - P-38J-25 Collector Plane
description: The P-38J-25 was a late model variant flown by the USAAF and saw action over Europe as well as in the Pacific.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Hs 129 B-2 Collector Plane
description: The Hs 129 was designed to be a general purpose armored ground attack plane, but during the second part of the war it became the main anti-tank aircraft flown by the Luftwaffe.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Blazing Steppe Campaign
description: This historical campaign is set during the early stage of the Stalingrad battle when the German XIV Panzer Corps breached through to the Volga River and the Luftwaffe unleashed all of its might on the civilian districts and defense lines of the city.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-9T Series 1 Collector Plane
description: Yak-9T was capable of not only engaging bombers and various ground targets, but could also hold its own as a dogfighter.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - MC.202 Series VIII Collector Plane
description: Fly the Italian Macchi 202, the best Italian fighter plane that saw action at the Eastern front of WWII!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Spitfire Mk.VB Collector Plane
description: The Supermarine Spitfire is a legendary example of British aircraft engineering and one of the best fighter aircraft of WWII.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Fw 190 D-9 Collector Plane
description: It started to appear above the front lines during Autumn 1944 and although it got a cold initial reception from the German pilots, it later earned their trust and is considered to be the best German piston-powered fighter of the late war period.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Bf 109 G-6 Collector Plane
description: The Bf 109 G-6 was the most produced Messerschmitt 109 model during the war with over 12,000 aircraft in total being built once production began in February 1943.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Flying Circus: Volume I
description: Experience what is was like to be an early aviation pioneer and test the tactics and machines that would forever change warfare by bringing it to the skies for the first time.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - GAZ-MM 72-K Anti-Aircraft Gun
description: This mobile AAA gun allows you to protect an armored column, supply convoy, infantry unit or a stationary target like an airbase with accurate and deadly fire.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Fortress on the Volga Campaign
description: When the continuous German assaults on the city were met with Soviet counterstrikes, the fight for air superiority wasn't any less furious. You'll be the deputy Staffel commander in I./JG 52 that has been redirected to Stalingrad from the central part of the Eastern front.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Moscow
description: This legendary battle of World War II took place from October 1941 to April 1942. The Battle of Moscow campaign takes place on a large-scale map (270 km x 290 km) (168 mi. x 180 mi.) with Autumn and Winter seasonal terrain.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Tank Crew: Clash at Prokhorovka
description: Tank Crew is a new ground-breaking tank simulator that allows you to experience WWII from inside one of ten legendary WWII tanks and battle enemy armored units for control of the village of Prokhorovka and the surrounding area during the battle of Kursk in 1943.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ju 52/3m Collector Plane
description: Designed as a civilian passenger plane in 1930s, the Ju-52/Зm saw widespread use during the entire war, essentially becoming the symbol of Luftwaffe transport operations.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Kuban
description: The third installment of the next-gen IL-2 Sturmovik series is dedicated to large scale aerial battles between the Red Air Force and the Luftwaffe in the skies over the Kuban front in 1943.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - La-5FN series 2 Collector Plane
description: The La-5FN was used by many famous Soviet air regiments and many famous pilots, including the most successful Allied ace, triple Hero of the Soviet Union Ivan Kozhedub.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ice Ring Campaign
description: This historical campaign is dedicated to the Soviet ground attack aviation regiments during one of the most intense episodes of the Battle of Stalingrad in December 1942.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - P-40E-1 Collector Plane
description: Fly the legendary P-40, the most mass-produced fighter by the US during WWII.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Polikarpov U-2VS
description: During WWII, U-2VS was mainly used as a low-altitude bomber and recon plane. It was a very hard target for enemy fighters at low altitudes because of its low speed, resulting in its relatively high survivability rate. It was used by the famous "night witches", female pilots and navigators of 46th Guards night bomber regiment.

name: Tron Run/r: Disc Extender Bundle
description: Intensify your TRON RUN/r experience with new levels of DISC mode, new STREAM track elements, six new suits and three new cycles.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Unbreakable
description: The Unbreakable DLC features a new set of Weapons and Armors, and allows you to start a game with the Unbreakable modifier. This will turn off equipment wear and apply some balancing to compensate.

name: Crown Uncrown: 1D Tactics
description: Plan around enemy intents and seize the Crowns in a series of turn-based combat with permadeath and no RNG. Your Crowned party then becomes your next run's BOSSFIGHT! Unlock and find item synergies from enemy loot or The Merchant as you play. Each run is short but victory is just the beginning!

name: Mojin Returns
description: Mojin Returns is a multiplayer online adventure survival game. You need to collect, make and build it to find clues for going to the tomb. Here are your teammates who are the same as you, but you also need to be wary of predators.A mysterious and thrilling adventure feast is about to begin

name: Peppered: An Existential Platformer
description:
A light hearted 2D platformer about the meaningless of existence. Dark humour. Big focus on narrative-driven gameplay. Regret. Currently being developed for PC and Mac.
You play as a nameless civilian of an immortal world an hour before a return of the God of death. Life presents you with an opportunity to take this matter into your own hands. And then presents you with countless ways to fail spectacularly.

name: Our Way
description: Enjoy Horror with a breathtaking atmosphere with an emphasis on quality sound processing. Feel the fear through ubiquitous pitfalls and through questions about your own life. The game is based on well-known horror elements such as inventory, batteries and loss of life.

name: Runes of Magic: Dragon Adventure Pack
description: There’ll be nothing standing between you and your heroic career with the exclusive Dragon Adventure Pack with permanent bag space, fiery mount, Puss-in-Boots, huge costume set and more!

name: Master of Orion: Gnolam League
description: An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars! The lucky Gnolam join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Gigantica Road Lake
description: The Gigantica Road Lake is a fully-licensed venue in France known for the number and size of the carp present. With over 900 carp in the lake, including 50 trophy fish, you are assured plenty of action! The stock in this lake weigh in at an average of over 30lbs, with the biggest being over 60lbs.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Vengeance
description: Vengeance is a mega-expansion that provides a new mode of play for the heroes to face in the form of a team of villains. Players must work together to overcome their greatest challenge yet!

name: Yuna: Sugar Hearts and Love - New Love
description: Hello and welcome to Yuna World. Help Yuna collect candy hearts and accompany her through the day. Candy hearts are an important currency in the world of Yuna. Get to know her better privately, maybe you will like each other. You like collecting achievements? You've come to the right place.

name: Portal 2: Community Edition
description:
Portal 2: Community Edition is the best way to play and create Portal community content. This community maintained game can be used by anyone to create their own unique never before possible puzzles. Portal 2: Community Edition is built on top of Strata Source, a community maintained fork of the CS:GO engine.

The game is not finished yet. The beta will begin on the announced release date.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 3: Original Episode
description: The original version of Welcome To... Chichester 3

name: Mend Arcade Battle
description: MEND Arcade Battle is a turn-based RPG inspired by Fighting Game core mechanics. Players must tackle the Fighting Game staple challenge known as Arcade Mode with a Turn-based RPG twist! Choose your character and follow their path to defeating the final boss awaiting them at the end.

name: Deep the Game: The Darkest Cave
description: Welcome to The Darkest Cave - the most mysterious, hidden, and dangerous part of Deep. Apart from the danger from the parkour and monsters, now you have to master your movement in a no-light environment.

name: Rugby 18: The British and Irish Lions 2017 Team
description: Slip into the prestigious jersey of the 2017 British and Irish Lions. 35 players, including Owen Farrell, Jonathan Sexton and Leigh Halfpenny, available in "Quick Match," "Online Match" and "My Squad" modes.

name: Star Tactics Redux: Expeditions
description: Star Tactics Redux - Expeditions DLC adds a completely new game mode where you will be able to compose your fleets as you wish, make formations, choose which battles to participate, unlock new ships and their variants and fight diverse battles.

name: Kokorogawari: Mini Quiz Game
description: Kokorogawari Quiz is a short fun quiz which will reward you with trivia about Kokorogawari and its developer team. Answer the quiz correctly and be rewarded with some pre-created content and jokes by the dev team not shared elsewhere! ;)

name: Tennis World Tour: Alex De Minaur
description: Play as Australian revelation Alex De Minaur in Tennis World Tour.

name: Choice of the Vampire: St. Louis, Unreal City
description: A monster roams the Missouri countryside, hunting vampires. Will the vampire court of St. Louis tear itself apart even before he comes for their heartsblood? And how can this unreal city look to the future when the specters of the past refuse to stay dead?

name: King's Bounty: Legions - Champion of the Realm Pack
description: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Kingdom faction with a nice discount! The sight of orderly battle formations, shiny armor, swords tempered in hundreds of battles, vibrant flags and inconspicuous hoods of the Kingdom's best healers is enough to send any creature...

name: King's Bounty: Legions - Beast Master Pack
description: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Beasts faction with a nice discount! The Beasts are powerful indeed. They are creatures who live in the vast expanses of the realm, indomitable and capable of crushing any opponent.

name: King's Bounty: Legions - Lord of Chaos Pack
description: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Chaos faction with a nice discount! Primordial chaos retreated under the pressure of the Creator. Forced beyond the borders of corporeality, unbeaten and primal, it now bides its time for a decisive attack.

name: King's Bounty: Legions - True Tactician Ultimate Pack
description: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty: Legions players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures, enjoy fine artifacts and Royal Aura for 30 days -- and all at a discount! This pack was gathered based on recommendations from the top King's Bounty: Legions players. It contains units that go best together.

name: Riddle of the Sphinx: Moonlight Exploration
description: Moonlight Exploration unlocks never-before-seen exploration of the Giza Plateau, Great Sphinx, & Great Pyramid under a mysterious moonlit canopy of stars. Also features haunting Duduk music & the ability to night-fly Gil's helicopter giving you a rare bird's eye view of these impressive monuments!

name: Finding Brenda: Episode 1
description: Finding Brenda - Episode 1 is the first part of the episodic 3D point-and-click adventure. You slip into the role of Harold! One day he finds out that his wife Brenda wasn't just going to the supermarket - she was kidnapped! The human rebels are on the rise!

name: Angry Emoji the Game
description: Concentrated old-school fun gameplay in a modern package. Feel the action and the trill avoiding angry emoji and pick up coins and smilies along the way.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - The Empire Strikes Back Character Pack
description: Strike back and bring your favorite Bounty Hunters and Hoth-equiped Rebels to LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens with The Empire Strikes Back Character Pack! This epic character pack includes Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and more!

name: The ultimate secret of the universe: Soul
description: The dialogue content of the game is based on the cosmic cycle, 33 dimensional space-time and religious theology.

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Late Model Series Pack
description: Late Models come to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing!

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Knoxville Raceway
description: Head to Iowa and take on Knoxville Raceway!

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: The Dirt Track at Las Vegas Motor Speedway
description: Roll the dice and go all-in at The Dirt Track at Las Vegas Motor Speedway!

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: The Dirt Track at Charlotte
description: Welcome to The Dirt Track at Charlotte, the home of Saturday night action!

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Nether Class
description: At it’s core Nether is all about control. Control over space, ley-lines, and paths. And of course control over players. Three of Nether’s four base active spells are designed around this control and when used together with other classes can easily turn a fight in favor of the Nether mage.

name: Crystal Shard Adventure: Meta
description: This metagame is a parody of amateur adventure design, this metagame consists of a simple treasure hunting game, and a complex editor needed to complete it. The editor and its assistant Cuppit are all part of the game; anyone involved in game or level design should appreciate the humor.

name: Sovereign
description: Sovereign is an Open World, Action, Adventure, RPG.

name: Magical Battle Cry
description: Sin descripción

name: Teen Patti Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Sand Witch Adventures
description: Sand Witch Adventures is a roguelike game with bullet-hell elements. Cursed lands full of undead are fraught with wealth and knowledge for the young witches.

name: Hobbs Home
description: As an escape a man goes out into the wilderness for a nice relaxing camping trip. All is going great until in the middle of the night his curious dog finds himself lost in the forest. Playing as the dog Hobbs you'll experience challenging platforming gameplay as you attempt to get him home.

name: Space Farmers 2
description: Multiplayer madness returns in this anarchic platforming gadget-vania sequel. The Great Leek aims to conquer the Galaxy in Space Farmers 2; The Space Time Leek.

name: Qubie: Invader of Worlds
description: Qubie is an in-development platformer game designed to bring happiness and joy to all. Squash enemies, collect coins, and avoid various traps to progress through the levels. Oh and try to keep your cool!

name: Hikikomori Life
description: The hard life of a game addict. Feel the atmosphere of loneliness if you can. How infuriating it is when everything distracts you. And so I want to play!

name: FireFly
description: This is a story about girls suffering from autism and mild anxiety.

name: The Maze
description: The Maze was created to challenge you in many different ways, it has such a simple objective, find the end.The Maze is a very large 3d maze built on terrain, with vegetation, trees, water, and different biomes, it stretches many miles with dozens of different challenges,

name: Amira
description: Amira: A story driven adventure about a girl born in a middle eastern-fantasy world who finds by chance that her life is written and predetermined as she was helping her family, thus she fights for acceptance, love and writing her own life.

name: Snowman Saves Christmas
description: Snowman Saves Christmas is a 1980s Inspired 2D platformer. Featuring 250 Levels of retro inspired platforming fun split across 5 game modes and Multiple PowerUp items.

name: Glorious
description: Forge your Glorious Legacy in blood and bronze, in this roguelike action strategy game. The ancient world has been plunged into chaos and despair as the dark shadow of war looms over the land. Raise your army, summon your heroes, customise and command them to victory!

name: We Die
description: As a Reaper Class 4, Unit 82 (R482), your current job is to collect the remaining souls from a previous reaper's attempt. Your outcome is determined by your exploration, your reaping, and your attitude towards the many lost souls. You only get one chance to make an impression.

name: Shinobi Breaker
description: Hit the shuriken, break the bricks, get ultra instinct and become... The ShinobiBreaker.

name: Magissy
description: Magissy is an Open-World Story-Driven Adult RPG where you take place as a charismatic adventurer and excellent lover, who fears not the danger of dark corners of the Lyrn nor the darkest fantasies of it's behaviors.

name: Save Aisha
description: Help Emran rescue his daughter (Aisha) who has been taken from his arms. You will join him in his journey through the castles and forests to meet the king.

name: Kolobok: The Return
description: A preachy game based on a Russian fairy tale.

name: GhostCast
description: This Multiplier FPS is Fast paced, you will die but won't be dead, you will be a ghost but you can be human again.

name: Soarocity
description: An exciting 2d platformer with a painterly art style and unique rotation mechanic.

name: The Kingdom of Galanor
description: A wandering hero, you find yourself in the Kingdom Of Galanor where you will need to use all of your skills to survive the numerous quests you will undertake and the danger you will face.

name: Mr. Magic
description: Mr. Magic is an awesome, third-person, action-adventure game where you become a superhero. Unlock powerful skills by visiting secret places around the globe to retrieve mystical skills before they fall into the wrong hands. Master extraordinary abilities with mystical secrets!

name: The Day They Came
description: The game is set in current time, survive, craft, build, 5ppl coop.

name: The Crafter's Defense
description: An active strategy game where you customize your dungeon and defend against waves of invaders. Create your dungeon, place monsters and traps, and protect your core! Take direct control of any of your dungeon's monsters to directly engage in the combat or sit back watch the battle unfold.

name: Cyberpunk Messenger
description: Drive your vehicle as fast as you can through a cyberpunk city. Deliver packages from normal stores or earn some extra money by transporting suspicious stuff. Be the fastest in a neighborhood or lose your job. No one will cry for you in this tough world. Try yourself!

name: Comet Crusher: Block Breaker
description: While exploring deep space, you have come across our solar system. It is up to you to crush each layer of every planet in our solar system in this beautiful block breaker. See if you can complete each set of levels corresponding to each planet in order to unlock the next.

name: Mirrored Pawns
description: Mirrored Pawns is a relaxing puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning. Your goal is to successfully navigate 2 pawns across a chess-like board to the goal positions by working with the axes of symmetry provided to you.

name: Determinant
description: Post-apocalyptic physics-based open-world survival adventure game. Planned to include combat, base building, crafting, puzzles, survival and a compelling story to drive it. Building will be a core gameplay mechanic where you build structures to overcome challenges and solve puzzles in the world.

name: Cleanup Crew
description: Cleanup Crew is a multiplayer physics-based arena game inspired by the classics. Gather your friends and prepare to battle it out in the fight of your lives! Up to 4 online players, the last standing vacuum wins.

name: Toxa
description: ToxΔ adapts the action, adventure and unique genre. Equipped with magic warfare, teleportation, forest, sci-fi city and sea. On the same Maps, there are 2 graphic modes, namely soft and natural.

name: General Population
description: Experience the brutality of prison life in this first-person RPG. Survive as an inmate amidst the violence and politics of the penal system or enforce the rules as a corrections officer. Tattoo and craft, or bribe and murder your way to the top. But remember, your reputation is everything.

name: NKCell
description: NKCell is a VR game where you are a genetically modified natural killer cell that slash viruses and bacteria to keep your host's infection level at low rates.

name: Godo
description: 《Godo》 is a puzzle game that explores adventure, Work hard to find pieces of information and solve the final puzzle

name: Fear of The Unknown
description: Fear of The Unknown - Chapter One is a fear inducing horror game allowing players to dive into a long forgotten stream of memories that recalls victims of the dark figure that lurks around you. Will one's soul have the strength required to survive the inevitable...!?

name: Becloudead
description: Becloudead is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi hack and slash cinematic platformer. Unravel the dark truth behind the zombie apocalypse as you venture deep into the bloody and gruesome narrative of Becloudead.

name: City of Robots
description: Play as a super advanced AI- take control over the city of robots and expand your futuristic metropolis. Build your dream city and be the heart and brain of it. Craft technology and equipment for humankind or prepare for war against them.

name: Generation Nova
description: Manage a colony of people who woke too soon from their cryo-sleep. Build and manage a working generation ship and hopefully one day the grandchildren of the first generation might land on a habitable planet.

name: GeneRacing
description: Ein Top-Down Arcade Racing Game - with TrackEditor, League System, Steamintegration, Controllersupport, etc.

name: Leave!
description: This is a Horror Adventure game that takes VR movement and lets you move around as you please and it takes the horror aspect in that you will always be curious and worried about where you might get scared next.

name: Hyparxis
description: As an artificially created being with unlimited potential, explore the foundations and extensions of existence! Find friends and companions on this way, but take good care of them, because lives are fragile. Hyparxis is a turn-based, classic JRPG with unlimited character development.

name: Vampire Revenge
description: Vampire Revenge is an adult 2D game developed by Gaweb Studio. Play as a weakened vampire lord and fight your way to the top, either by fighting or seducing. Includes the following themes : blood sucking, hypnotism, fight, animated sex, maze exploration, power-ups and more!

name: Random Platformer
description: a minimalistic 2D platformer game with randomly generated levels. a level can't be exactly the same twice!

name: Attack on Titan: Episode 3
